title: BWNace
detail: Basic linear photodiodes sensor that can detect distinct differences in light.
extended_details: We initially designed a PCB for a CMOS sensor in which we wrote Verilog code for.  However,  due to unexpected reason, the CMOS sensor was not able to output anything.  Therefore, we decided to design a basic linear photodiode sensor that can detect distinct differences in light through an ADC in Arduino and show a corresponding 10x10 image after being processed in software.

parts_and_costs.part: DFROBOT MDV 2x2A DC Motor Controller for Arduino (L298N)
Adafruit TB6612 1.2A DC/Stepper Motor Driver Breakout Board
